QuestData.Title: The Lord Reclaimer
QuestData.Description: They have my daughter! Brojai... that Lord Reclaimer! I can see him clearly through Lyalia's eyes.$b$bThat foolish girl must have tried to take him head on.$b$bPlease, $p! Go to the Ruins of Korja and try to free her.$b$bI'll get Kang and try to draw out Brojai from the ruins with a distraction.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Lyalia and kill Groundbreaker Brojai.
QuestData.CompletionText: Lyalia is the only family I have left. I had to bury her mother during the war of Ahn'Qiraj.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for avenging my daughter. I am not willing to let her stay dead however.$b$bI still have the waters of youth.
